description.value:
You call upon your element to propel you, improving your Speed depending on your element. This spell has your element's trait.

  • @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spell-effects.Item.Spell Effect: Elemental Motion (Air)]{Air} You gain a fly Speed equal to your Speed.
  • @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spell-effects.Item.Spell Effect: Elemental Motion (Earth)]{Earth} You gain a burrow Speed of 10 feet.
  • @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spell-effects.Item.Spell Effect: Elemental Motion (Fire)]{Fire} You gain a fly Speed equal to your Speed.
  • @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spell-effects.Item.Spell Effect: Elemental Motion (Water)]{Water} You gain a swim Speed equal to your Speed and can breathe underwater.

Heightened (6th) You also gain a +10-foot status bonus to your Speeds.

Heightened (9th) The status bonus increases to +20 feet.
